name: Node.Monster
description: Node.Monster delivers high-performance, scalable, secure node operations across 20+ networks, including ether.fi, Symbiotic, Axelar, Wallet Connect, Stride, NEAR, and more. We are a trusted leader in blockchain infrastructure with over $1B in staking and restaking AUM. Our robust infrastructure combines data centers and bare-metal servers in the Middle East with top-tier cloud providers in Europe and the US, ensuring decentralization and reliability. We are deeply engaged in governance, community building, and network development.
